Notes on frequently disabled pylint warnings/errors:

  • unsubscriptable-object: because sheepdog.dictionary must be initialized later by the application using sheepdog, it appears to pylint that operations such as dictionary.schema[entity_type] should not work.
  • unsupported-membership-test: again because of sheepdog.dictionary.
